desc: This book contains the thoroughly refereed technical papers presented in six workshops collocated with the International Conference on Software Technologies: Applications and Foundations, STAF 2017, held in Marburg, Germany, in July 2017.
title: Software Technologies: Applications and Foundations: STAF 2017 Collocated Workshops, Marburg, Germany, July 17-21, 2017, Revised Selected Papers (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
